title: Chicken and sugarsnap noodle salad
ingredients: ['200g sugarsnap peas', '200g dried medium egg noodles', '1 tbsp tahini', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '1 crushed garlic clove', '2 tsp grated fresh root ginger', '240g cold cooked chicken']
